detail_desc: Longer V-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable buttoning.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with an opening and press-stud at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a boat neck and dropped shoulders.
Round-necked T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a flounced trim at the top, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest tops in stretch organic cotton jersey.
Fitted jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a long sleeves, a polo neck with a roll edge at the top, and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
3/4-length pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned cotton weave with and elasticated waistband with a drawstring. Fake fly, side pockets, one back pocket and elasticated hems.
Earrings made of round metal rings. Length 7 cm, diameter of larger ring approx 4.5 cm.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, slightly stretchy denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, flap front pockets with a button, back pockets and gently flared legs with creases.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers in soft fabric. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Wrapover V-neck blouse in woven fabric with long sleeves and a tie at the waist.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with an open chest pocket and decorative seam at the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with an open front pocket, straps with adjustable buttons at the front, and legs with appliqués and rolled-up edges at the hems.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Ribbed wool jumper in a straight style with long raglan sleeves.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long kimono in a patterned crêpe weave with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets. No buttons.

Fitted, one-shoulder top in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a concealed zip in one side. Draping at the top and one long puff sleeve with an organza flounce on the inside of the shoulder for added volume and a zip at the cuff.
Long-sleeved tops in jersey made from organic cotton.
Dress in a slub-knit cotton blend with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a braided tie belt with glittery threads and a rounded hem. Brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Imitation suede trainers with appliqués and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Joggers in woven fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, zipped side pockets and jetted back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The joggers incorporate COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with sparkly stones at the top. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with cut-off, frayed hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.

Sandals in imitation leather decorated with fabric flowers. Padded edge, an adjustable hook and loop fastening at one side and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved tops in a soft cotton blend.

prod_name: LS body and leggings rib set
detail_desc: Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey.
Wide hairband in ribbed jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a zip fly and hook and loop fastening, elasticated hems and an elastic strap under the feet. The trousers are in a slightly higher cut at the back with elastication at the waist and have elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Reflective details and a fleece lining. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short, sleeveless top in ribbed jersey, designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, an open chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Calf-length shirt dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar, press-studs down the front and a button band with a decorative tab at the top. Large patch front pockets and extra-long wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats at the top, belt loops with a press-stud, and a detachable tie belt with elastication in the middle. Slit at the back.

Bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Dressy leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from wool with a high, elasticated waist and legs with sewn-in creases, and slits at the hems.
Gloves knitted in a cashmere blend with a high shaft.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Legs with stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Low cut and a concealed zip at the back, and straight, wide legs.
Shorter top in jersey with a frilled yoke, V-neck and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Elasticated seam and a frill trim at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in slub jersey with a round neck, lace yoke and straight hem.

Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in stretch, glossy jersey with pleated straps that go over the arms. Discreet V-neck, a silicone trim around the inside of the top, and a concealed zip at the back. Lined at the top.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in soft pile with a double-layered stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Outdoor jacket in nylon with a lined, detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Elasticated drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Turbans in soft cotton jersey with a decorative gathered detail at the front.
Slippers in soft fabric with a bow at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles, and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Large plastic hair claw.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 3.7 cm.

Single-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar, shoulder tabs with a button, and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and buttons at the front. Loose yoke at the back, partial yoke at the front, side pockets and an inner pocket. Tab and metal fastener at the cuffs and a single back vent.
One-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with a shoulder strap, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton jersey. Dress with an elasticated waist and straps with sewn-on appliqués on the front that cross at the back and fasten with buttons. Top with short, frilled cap sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder.
Wide, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, small stand-up collar and concealed buttons at the front. Dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, pleats at the front and a V-shaped opening at the back with wide ties at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Swim top in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with pleats at the top and an opening with press-studs at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a slit at the front. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.
Short, fitted dress in crisp cotton poplin with a concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length, voluminous balloon sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs. Lined sleeves.

Cargo trousers in lightweight viscose twill with gathered elastication at the back of the waist and a zip fly and button. Side and leg pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastener, fake back pockets with a flap and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
